cards.name: Coldhands
cards.text: Coldhands cannot be saved. Reaction: After you marshal Coldhands, choose another non-Army character controlled by each player. Remove each of those characters from the game until Coldhands leaves play.

cards.name: Cersei's Informer
cards.text: Bestow (3). Action: Move 1 gold from Cersei's Informer to a non-Spy card you control to draw 1 card. Then, choose and discard 1 card from your hand. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: The High Sparrow
cards.text:
Each player cannot gain more than 7 gold each round.
Each player cannot draw more than 3 cards each round.

cards.name: "The Song of the Seven"
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose dominance, move 2 power from the winning opponent's faction card to a The Seven character you control. (Max 1 per phase.)

cards.name: The Faith Militant
cards.text: Non-The Seven characters and locations you control cannot gain power. Reaction: After you win a chalenge, kneel your faction card to move 1 power from the losing opponent's faction card to a participating The Seven character you control.
